comprehensive_overview: CPE (Coarse-grained Parallel Environment) is a software tool used for parallelizing loop computations for high-performance computing (HPC) applications. It aims to provide an efficient, user-friendly environment for developing parallel programs.
core_features:
1. Automatic parallelization of loop computations
2. Supports parallel programming using OpenMP directives
3. Provides optimization features for improving performance
4. Includes debugging and profiling tools
5. Allows for scalability on large HPC systems
